++ Clients

Clients are the frontend to [Servers]. They are composed of [Frontend]s and [Backend]s. see UserInterfaces.

++Architecture

SystemComparison determines what functionality provided by the client is not implemented by the server. For this reason, a [Checklist]s are used to explain this to the user. ListStyle and ClearOnPrerequisites and ClearOnCapability.
    * colour coded for different levels of compatibility
    * ticks/crosses or quantitive information
This is a StateList.
